items.sentence: Tom walked as fast as he could to catch up with Mary.
Tom wanted Mary to forgive John for what he had done.
Tom wanted a place in the country he could call home.
I thought that Tom said that Mary was from Australia.
I told Tom we were going to Australia for a few days.
We could hear footsteps crunching through the gravel.
We had a little trouble with the equipment yesterday.
I want to know how many times you\'ve been to Boston.
I was hoping the ice cream wouldn\'t melt so quickly.
Tom said he thought he heard voices in the next room.
